mapper.select: SELECT rtk.id as id, rtk.task_name as taskName, rtk.main_script as mainScript, rtk.task_rule as taskRule, rtk.node_id as nodeId, rtk.node_type as nodeType, rtn.node_name as nodeName, rtk.run_node_id as runNodeId, rtk.last_run_time as lastRunTime, rtk.next_time as nextTime, rtk.description as description, rtk.created as created, rtk.modified as modified FROM reign_task rtk LEFT JOIN reign_task_node rtn ON rtk.node_id = rtn.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') >= rtk.next_time AND rtk.disabled!=1
mapper.update: UPDATE reign_task SET run_node_id=#{runNodeId}, last_run_time=#{lastRunTime}, `status`=#{status}, next_time=#{nextTime}, run_log_id=#{runLogId} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT rtk.id as id, rtk.`status` AS status, rtk.task_name as taskName, rtk.main_script as mainScript, rtk.task_rule as taskRule, rtk.node_id as nodeId, rtk.node_type as nodeType, rtn.node_name as nodeName, rtk.run_node_id as runNodeId, rtk.last_run_time as lastRunTime, rtk.next_time as nextTime, rtk.description as description, rtk.created as created, rtk.modified as modified FROM reign_task rtk LEFT JOIN reign_task_node rtn ON rtk.node_id = rtn.id WHERE rtk.id=#{taskId} AND rtk.disabled!=1

SELECT rtk.id as id, rtk.`status` AS status, rtk.task_name as taskName, rtk.main_script as mainScript, rtk.task_rule as taskRule, rtk.node_id as nodeId, rtk.node_type as nodeType, rtn.node_name as nodeName, rtk.run_node_id as runNodeId, rtk.last_run_time as lastRunTime, rtk.next_time as nextTime, rtk.description as description, rtk.created as created, rtk.modified as modified, rtn2.node_name AS runNodeName FROM reign_task rtk LEFT JOIN reign_task_node rtn ON rtk.node_id = rtn.id LEFT JOIN reign_task_node rtn2 ON rtk.run_node_id=rtn2.id WHERE (rtk.`status`='1' OR rtk.`status`='2') AND rtk.disabled!=1
